snippet: The agency says former executives at Thornburg Mortgage, once the nation's second-largest mortgage company after Countrywide Financial, hid the company's deteriorating financial condition at the onset of the financial crisis in 2008.
abstract: The agency says former executives at Thornburg Mortgage, once the nation's second-largest mortgage company after Countrywide Financial, hid the company's deteriorating financial condition at the onset of the financial crisis in 2008.

headline.main: S.E.C. Charges Three Former Mortgage Executives With Fraud
